Project · Open source

Data Canvas

Launched 2024 — Live

Data Canvas is an open-source toolkit for describing event-driven data flows with live diagrams and deployment checks. It keeps pipelines transparent while they evolve.

Notable technologies

  • TypeScript and D3 for interactive, zoomable graphs of the pipeline.
  • GraphQL APIs to query dependencies and surface validation results.
  • CLI guardrails that run deployment checks before merges.

View GitHub repo
